bottom_landing_safeties_type_2_condition.replace_whole_assembly: The bottom photo eye/ in-track assembly must be replaced.

bottom_landing_safeties_type_3_condition.replace_whole_assembly: The bottom in-rail or photo eye assembly must be replaced.

bottom_landing_safeties_bottom_reset.no: There was no bottom reset found during inspection. It is required that a bottom reset be installed.

bottom_landing_safeties_bottom_reset_loc.relocated: The bottom reset is non-compliant and must be relocated.

bottom_landing_safeties_bottom_reset_com.no: The bottom reset is non-compliant and must be relocated.

bottom_landing_safeties_bottom_reset_con.inoperable: The bottom reset was inoperable and must be repaired or replaced.

bottom_landing_instruction_sign.non_compliant: The instruction sign on landing {i} is/are non-compliant and must be replaced.

bottom_landing_bottom_floor_get_off_sign.no: A 'BOTTOM FLOOR - GET OFF' sign must be placed on landing #1.
bottom_landing_bottom_floor_get_off_sign.non_compliant: The 'BOTTOM FLOOR - GET OFF' sign is non-compliant

bottom_landing_bottom_floor_get_off_sign.relocate: The 'BOTTOM FLOOR - GET OFF' sign must be in a location that is easily visible by all parties operating the belt manlift.

bottom_landing_red_warning_light.no: The red warning light on the top landing was not observed during the time of inspection. It is required that a Red Warning Light be installed.
bottom_landing_red_warning_light.inoperable: The red warning light on the bottom landing is inoperable and must be repaired or replaced.

bottom_landing_light_location.relocate: It is required that the Red Warning Light be relocated within 24" of the ceiling below the landing.

bottom_landing_manlift_clean.no: The manlift was found to be not clean at the time of inspection, the manlift should remain clean and free of debris at all times.

bottom_landing_describe_opening.non_compliant: The mounting/dismounting platforms are non-compliant for shape. The openings for the mounting and dismounting platforms at the bottom of the manlift are required to be approximately circular in shape.

bottom_landing_is_step_level_after_compl.no: The steps are not level where they reach the mounting surface of the platform, as required.

bottom_landing_distance_from_floor_openi.non_compliant: When guard railing is more than 24" away from the floor opening, it must be at least 42" in height. When the guard rail is less than 24" from the opening, it must be at least 66" in height.

bottom_landing_is_there_a_wall_in_front_.yes: Forty-eight inches of clear space to the rear of the belt must be provided.

bottom_landing_distance_from_floor_openi.non_compliant: When guard railing is more than 24" away from the floor opening, it must be at least 42" in height. When the guard rail is less than 24" from the opening, it must be at least 66" in height.

bottom_landing_ladder_rungs.no: Ladder rungs at the top landing were not observed during the time of inspection. It is required that ladder rungs be installed.

bottom_landing_distance_between_rungs.other: The ladder rungs must be spaced evenly at approximately 12" centers to be code compliant.

bottom_landing_ladder_rungs_condition.replace_damaged: The ladder rungs are damaged and must be replaced.
bottom_landing_ladder_rungs_condition.replace_worn: The ladder rungs are worn and must be replaced.

bottom_landing_are_gates_self_closing.no: Outward opening self-closing gates are required.

bottom_landing_open_outward.no: All manlift gates must open outward.

bottom_landing_are_gates_missing.yes: ____ additional gates are missing on the bottom landing.

bottom_landing_toeboard.no: Toeboard was not observed during the time of inspection. It is required that a Toeboard be installed.

bottom_landing_add_toeboard_required.yes: An additional 4" of Toeboard is required.

bottom_landing_toeboard_height.other: New guard railing must be installed to meet minimum requirements.

bottom_landing_distance_from_face_of_bel.non_compliant: The distance from the belt to the leading edge of the mounting platform is non-compliant on all landings must be 24" to meet minimum requirements.

bottom_landing_hood_type_of_hood.none: Under floor hoods are required below the floor opening on the 'UP' travel side.

condition.replace_switch: Top landing safety switch must be replaced.
condition.replace_whole_assembly: The whole assembly of top landing safety must be replaced.

drive_assembly_toplandingsafeties_topres.no: The Top Reset was not observed at the time of inspection. It is required that a Top Reset be installed

location.relocated: The top reset is non-compliant and must be relocated.

compliant.no: The top reset button is non-compliant and must be relocated.

drive_assembly_toplandingsafeties_topres.inoperable: Top Reset is inoperable and must be replaced.

hasalertingsystem.no: No Visual and/or Audible Alerting System was found to be present at the time of inspection. It is required that a Visual and/or Audible Alerting System be installed.

electrical_hascontrolpanel.no: A Manlift Control Panel was not observed at the time of inspection. It is recommended a Manlift Control Panel be installed.

electrical_hasstarter.no: A starter was not observed at the time of inspection. It is required that a Starter be installed.

electrical_hascontrolrelay.no: A control relay was not observed at the time of inspection. It is required that a control relay be installed.

electrical_hasphasereversalrelay.no: The phase reversal relay was not observed at the time of inspection. It is required that a phase reversal relay be installed.

electrical_has3polecontactor.no: A 3-pole contactor was not observed at the time of inspection. It is required that a 3-pole contactor be installed.

load_test_testresult.pass: The unit did pass a full load test.
load_test_testresult.fail: This unit did not pass a full load test.
